features: Includes: 2 x Coconut Lip Balm Tubes
Lip relief to last throughout the day
Leaves your lips feeling naturally soft, smooth and healthy
Helps protect lips from the harsh & damaging effects of wind & cold
description: Product description Pretty Coconut Lip Balm helps protect your lips from the harsh and damaging effects of the wind and cold. Lip relief to last throughout the day, leaving your lips feeling naturally soft, smooth and healthy. Includes: 2 x 4.3 Lip Balm Tubes Directions Apply a thin layer of lip balm to lips as needed, especially before going outdoors in cold or windy conditions for protection. Safety Warning Warning: This product contains ingredients that may cause allergic reactions in some people. Avoid exposure to heat sources. See more
